Hello,

we are going to start our software development with WPF, MVVM and Prsim.Now its just a windows based application.There is requirement of porting this application to web based silverlight application in near future.

I would like to know the risks involve if we use prism in this scenario. What are the changes required for silverlight-- in prism scenario???

Hi,

I believe you could find the following chapter of the Prism documentation useful:

  • Chapter 10: Sharing Code Between Silverlight and WPF

The aforementioned chapter explains both the considerations needed to develop a multi-targeting application (for example, for WPF and Silverlight) from a Prism perspective while keeping as much code as possible and the main considerations when transitioning from an existing application in one platform to the other.

Regards,

Damian Cherubini
